mapper.select: SELECT i.id in_id,i.in_count,i.user_name,i.in_time, i.sme_id , c.id, c.sme_name,c.sme_count FROM in_record i inner join consume c on i.sme_id=c.id WHERE i.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%') OR i.in_count like concat('%',#{inCount},'%') OR i.sme_id like concat('%',#{smeId},'%') OR c.sme_name like concat('%',#{smeName},'%') OR c.sme_count like concat('%',#{smeCount},'%') ORDER BY in_id ASC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM in_record i inner join consume c on i.sme_id=c.id WHERE i.user_name like concat('%',#{userName},'%') OR i.in_count like concat('%',#{inCount},'%') OR i.sme_id like concat('%',#{smeId},'%') OR c.sme_name like concat('%',#{smeName},'%') OR c.sme_count like concat('%',#{smeCount},'%')

SELECT o.id out_id,o.out_count,o.user_name,o.out_status,o.out_reason,o.out_time,o.sme_id, c.sme_name,c.sme_count FROM out_record o LEFT JOIN consume c ON o.sme_id=c.id WHERE o.out_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outCount},'%') OR o.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') OR o.out_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outStatus},'%') OR o.out_reason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outReason},'%') OR o.sme_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeId},'%') OR c.sme_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeName},'%') OR c.sme_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeCount}) ORDER BY out_id ASC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM out_record o LEFT JOIN consume c ON o.sme_id=c.id WHERE o.out_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outCount},'%') OR o.user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userName},'%') OR o.out_status LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outStatus},'%') OR o.out_reason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{outReason},'%') OR o.sme_id LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeId},'%') OR c.sme_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeName},'%') OR c.sme_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeCount})

SELECT * FROM consume WHERE sme_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeName},'%') OR sme_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeCount},'%')
ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{start},#{pageSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM (SELECT * FROM consume WHERE sme_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeName},'%') OR sme_count LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smeCount},'%')
ORDER BY id ASC ) tmp
